fields.name: Hip CT
fields.description: This is a CT volume that includes the pelvis and L and R hips.  It comes from the TotalSegmentator image collection.  There is no obvious pathology in this image, but it is an example of a field of view that might be acquired for pelvic fracture surgery planning, lower spine diagnostic or planning, or some kind of revision surgery of hip fracture or total hip.
fields.source: TotalSegmentator CT volume and segmentations from case S0042

fields.name: Lumbar Spine CT
fields.description: This is a CT volume that includes the lumbar spine vertebrae.  It comes from the TotalSegmentator image collection.  This is an example of a CT that might be acquired for diagnostic or spinal surgery planning purposes.
fields.source: TotalSegmentator CT volume and segmentations from case S0010

fields.name: VerSe Spine CT
fields.description: This is a CT volume that includes the spine vertebrae.  It comes from the VerSe image collection.  This is an example of a CT that might be acquired for diagnostic or spinal surgery planning purposes.  These data are released under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International license, which is described here for the VerSe data: https://osf.io/amh4f
